      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        This overrides Passes an object that is a Point2D object. If this Point2D object's x and y equals to the given Point2D's x and y, return true, which means both objects are equal. Otherwise, both objects are not equal so, return false
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - passes a Point2D object in the form of a general object
        Returns:
